Great article Sean - we regularly use these approaches when making content modelling changes on projects (often during redesigns/rebuilds). I think the decision on which approach to take always depends on the scale of data being impacted/changed.
I particularly like your example for **reusable field schemas** here - with them being recently released in a refresh, we are now looking to migrate existing content types on a project to make use of RFS to improve their content models!
